definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Researchers have even given up trying to define it.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员甚至放弃了为它下定义的努力。

sentences.english: It is difficult to define love.
To give a definition of a word is more difficult than to give an illustration of its use.
sentences.chinese: 给一个词下定义要比举例说明它的用法困难得多。

sentences.english: How do you define self confidence?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么对自信下定义的？

sentences.english: This linking is done based on the type of mapping defined in your EC environment.
sentences.chinese: 这个链接是建立在你在EC环境下定义并映射的类型。

sentences.english: Illustration is often more useful than definition for giving the meanings of words.
sentences.chinese: 在给字义时，举例常比下定义更有用。

sentences.english: Dictionary writer must is skilled in the art of definition.
sentences.chinese: 编纂者必须精于给词语下定义的技巧。

sentences.english: How can the framework of the legal definition of insinuate and imply?
sentences.chinese: 又如何在法律的框架下定义影射与暗示？
给文学下定义还是有可能的。

sentences.english: Dictionary writers must be skilled in ther art of definition.
sentences.chinese: 辞书编纂者必须精于给词语下定义的技巧。

sentences.english: The people defined him as a wonderful minister.
sentences.chinese: 人民给他下定义为一个极好的大臣。

definition: to tag sb with unfair label/power word
(lit.) to take a part for the whole/to generalize
lit. eyes obscured by a single leaf (idiom)/fig. not seeing the wider picture/can't see the wood for the trees
to determine the nature (usually of error or crime)/to determine chemical composition/qualitative/fixed
to say what everyone says (idiom)/to conform to what one perceives to be the majority view/to follow the herd
